videoSection.heading: Hear about Karla's experiences with film in school

info.heading: Subtitles read out in class
p: SubReader School allows teachers to show foreign educational films in the classroom, without having to worry about whether dyslexics and other low-reading students can keep up.
SubReader can be used on the usual teaching services: MitCFU and Filmcentralen, but also on Netflix, Disney+ and Viaplay.

contactSection.heading: Contact us and learn more about SubReader
contactSection.spam: You must wait 10 minutes before sending again.
